name: Stack Shooter
description:
My First ever Game. Its about Player collecting Ammos in stacks above each other and shooting it on to the enemies to eliminate them. The Game is Fairly Simple and challenging at same time. Hope that you would enjoy playing it <3

There are Total of  5 levels for Stage 1 and one level each for Stage 2 and Stage 3 for now. More levels will be added for Stage 2 &3 in future updates. 

Any Reviews and Suggestions are open. There might be several bugs ,Let me know about them and I will fix them in future update.
